gazpromNeft.title: Professionals 4.0
gazpromNeft.subTitle: Client
gazpromNeft.text:
Gazprom Neft is a vertically integrated oil company engaged primarily in oil and gas exploration, production, and refining, as well as the production and sale of petroleum products.

The company is one of the key drivers of the Russian economy and the fastest growing in its sector.

Gazprom Neft invests in the development of new technology, and social and educational projects. In 2018, the company announced the beginning of the digital overhaul of its business.

s7Airlines.title: Personal Account of an S7 Airline Customer
s7Airlines.subTitle: Client
s7Airlines.text: S7 Airlines is the largest Russian domestic private airline. It is a part of S7 AirSpace Corporation, a group of companies doing business in tourism and ticket distribution, passengers and cargo air transportation, flight personnel training, aircraft repair, and other aviation and space services.
